text: Stara Łomnica is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was part of Germany. It lies approximately north-west of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south-west of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 800. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Stara Łomnica
